author: Erin McDowell
title: I tried every kind of McFlurry at McDonald's and ranked them from worst to best
description: McDonald's offers three kinds of McFlurries: Oreo, Hershey's S'Mores, and M&M. I thought the Oreo-flavored McFlurry was the most satisfying.
content:
The toppings were all concentrated at the top, leaving plain ice cream underneath.Erin McDowell/Business Insider
